983900.name: Mojack - Quest of Jackal : Puzzle game
983900.description:
MOJACK - QUEST OF JACKAL : PUZZLE ADVENTURE

Prepare to embark on an epic adventurous Journey along with Mojack, The Jackal!.

Breath-taking 3D visuals and exciting gameplay into adventure survival escape that you will never forget.

Guide Mojack on the journey of survival and help to find the lost treasures. Solve puzzles, be aware of traps and be safe while you guide the Mojack to the destiny.

A multi-level game which will test your ability to solve the puzzle, Improve your analytic skills, Problem-solving skills and test your concentration level as you tackle the traps. Use all your wits to unravel the treasures.

Are you smart? This is a brain teaser for you!

What are you waiting for? Just download now and start the quest.
